channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins Azure AD Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins Azure AD Plugin

item.title: CVE-2021-21679|2024-08-03T18:23:29.177Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20azure%20ad%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Azure AD Plugin 179.vf6841393099e and earlier allows attackers to craft URLs that would bypass the CSRF protection of any target URL in Jenkins.
